title: Transfer account
body: When will Transfer Account from NA to Taiwan available? I waited it for 2 years {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: With Taiwan being a part of the Garena servers, it won't be possible to transfer an account onto that server. It's mostly due to how their servers are handled and operate differently. We did open up those transfer when the servers were first created, and if they ever open back up you can be sure to know by checking the boards and our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news).
